about_the_game:
Near Sol is a space strategy game developed by an indie developer.

The game takes place in the solar system and in the nearest 30 stars.

Lead a space power, small or large. Find the resources you need, or create an economic alliance with your neighbors, organize the production of the most demanded goods. Earn money. Become a rich and developed state!

Develop powerful spaceships, build cities on distant planets, or become a large sparsely populated nation. In the cities you will find different types of citizens, resources, and opportunities for construction.

The game is published for joint development with the players!

What kind of resources and types of citizens would you like? (now this question is actual for the developer).
The demo version is exactly the same as the paid version! Buy the game if you want to support the developer.
detailed_description:
Near Sol is a space strategy game developed by an indie developer.

The game takes place in the solar system and in the nearest 30 stars.

Lead a space power, small or large. Find the resources you need, or create an economic alliance with your neighbors, organize the production of the most demanded goods. Earn money. Become a rich and developed state!

Develop powerful spaceships, build cities on distant planets, or become a large sparsely populated nation. In the cities you will find different types of citizens, resources, and opportunities for construction.

The game is published for joint development with the players!

What kind of resources and types of citizens would you like? (now this question is actual for the developer).
The demo version is exactly the same as the paid version! Buy the game if you want to support the developer.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 1030 or equivalent 1 GB VRam
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G4900
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 1030 or equivalent

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530
  • Graphics: GT 1030 or equivalent 1 GB VRam
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G4900
  • Graphics: GT 1030 or equivalent

name: Near Sol

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 1030 or equivalent 1 GB VRam
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G4900
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 1030 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Space 4X game with the ability to build factories, extract resources, with characters, internal and external markets ... Take part in the discussion of the game, share your vision)
supported_languages: English, German, Polish, Russian, Czech, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
